name: Zueirama 2077
storyline:
The world is getting boring, your friends are losing their zoeira and turning into buns and bologna. And who's behind it is the terrible Sergeant Sadipo!
Sergeant Sádipo, the villain of the game, was born with a rare disease that prevents him from feeling humor and silliness. And because he doesn't understand humour, he wants to put an end to it. To do so, he has created a machine capable of taking away people's humour and will then turn everyone into his grumpy little monsters.
To avoid this disaster, several comic characters have come together to create Zueirama and confront Sádipo. Tião, the jaguar tamer and member of Zueirama, found the courage and bravery he needed in Zoinho, the story's protagonist. Zoinho, a lazy motorcycle courier, is the most trolling guy in the world. Can he stop Sergeant Sádipo with so much fun in his veins?
Join us on this incredible adventure full of humor and don't let your friends become grumpy too.
Help save Zueira!
summary: Zueirama 2077 is an update to the game Zueirama, the humor game based in brazilian games now with an futuristic aesthetic.
